snippet: John Bowlen, the 29-year-old son of the Denver Broncos’ owner, Pat Bowlen, has been placed on indefinite leave from the team after his arrest on domestic violence charges.
abstract: Denver Broncos place John Bowlen, son of Broncos owner Pat Bowlen, on indefinite leave after his arrest on domestic violence charges; other NFL news noted.
lead_paragraph: John Bowlen, the 29-year-old son of the Denver Broncos’ owner, Pat Bowlen, has been placed on indefinite leave from the team after his arrest on domestic violence charges.

headline.main: Son of Broncos Owner Is Arrested
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Football; Owner’s Son Is Arrested
